title: FEC says it doesn't have authority to regulate AI content in political ads
description: Most members of the FED on Thursday said they did not have the authority to act on a petition to impose regulations on content in political ads that was generated by AI

title: Police department apologizes over image of Black man used for target practice
description: A representative from the police department told ABC News that the human images will no longer be used for civilian target practice.

title: Dozens of frozen fruit products sold at 6 major retailers recalled by FDA
description: Dozens of frozen fruit products sold to Walmart, Whole Foods, Target, Aldi and more have been voluntarily recalled over Lysteria monocytogen concerns.

title: WATCH:  Therapy dog graduates with high school classmates
description: Spiffy the dog graduated with the class of 2023 at Scotch Plains-Fanwood High School, becoming a certified therapy dog.

title: African lion pride swells with birth of 4 cubs at Buffalo Zoo
description: The Buffalo Zoo says four African lion cubs have been born at the zoo and all appear to be healthy and growing

title: TikTok COO to step down from the company after nearly 5 years in the role
description: TikTok’s Chief Operating Officer and one of the company’s most public faces, V Pappas, is stepping down after nearly five years at the company

title: Trump's position on the death penalty and other key takeaways from interview
description: Trump was asked by Fox News' Bret Baier about his support for putting drug dealers to death, and Baier cited the case of Alice Johnson, whom Trump freed

title: Kesha, Dr Luke settle longstanding legal battle over rape, defamation claims
description: Pop star Kesha and producer Dr. Luke have settled nearly a decade of suits and countersuits over her accusation that he drugged and raped her and his claim that she made it up and defamed him

title: CBP ignored pleas for help before migrant girl's death, parents say
description: Anadith Reyes Álvarez died while in the custody of U.S. Border Patrol.

title: Tenn. GOP lawmakers receive mail with 'white powder substance,' lockdown in effect
description: Part of Tennessee’s legislative office building in Nashville has been placed on lockdown after several Republican leaders received what House Speaker Cameron Sexton says was “a white powder substance” in the mail

title: WATCH:  Alpacas take stroll along the streets of Tokyo
description: A pair of fluffy alpacas took to the streets of Tokyo, passing by shops and temples while being greeted by pedestrians.

title: Musk throws down the gauntlet and Zuckerberg accepts challenge
description: Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg are ready to fight, offline

title: FDA warns stores to stop selling Elf Bar, the top disposable e-cigarette in the US
description: U.S. regulators have sent warning letters to dozens of retailers selling fruity disposable e-cigarettes, including the current best-selling brand, Elf Bar

title: Ancient Mayan city discovered deep in Mexican jungle
description: A team of archaeologists in Mexico have discovered the remains of an ancient Maya city, deep in the jungle of Yucatán Peninsula, Southern Mexico.

title: Greek authorities rescue 145 migrants who were found stranded on a river islet
description: Greek authorities say they have rescued 145 migrants found stranded on an islet on the river that runs along the northeastern land border with Turkey

title: Monthly e-cigarette sales rose by nearly 50% during first 2 years of pandemic: CDC
description: A new study from the CDC published Thursday found that monthly e-cigarette sales rose by nearly 50% during the first two years of the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: George Santos' father and aunt guaranteed his $500K bond, court documents show
description: Rep. George Santos' father and aunt guaranteed his $500,000 bond, according to a court document unsealed Thursday over the congressman's objection.

title: Winnie Ewing, icon of Scotland's pro-independence movement, dies at 93
description: A politician considered to be the mother of the modern Scottish independence movement has died at the age of 93

title: Immigration drove white, Asian population growth in US last year
description: Without immigration, the white population in the U.S. would have declined last year

title: Hail pummels concertgoers before Louis Tomlinson show near Denver, injuring dozens
description: Firefighters say seven people were taken to the hospital and up to 90 people were treated for injuries after hail pummeled concertgoers at Red Rocks Amphitheater near Denver on Wednesday

title: Cybersecurity expert on how to protect your family from AI scams
description: Pete Nicoletti of Check Point Software Technologies, a cybersecurity firm, spoke to ABC’s Whit Johnson, to explain the rapidly evolving technology behind AI.

title: Pope short of breath, says still feeling effects of anesthesia 2 weeks after surgery
description: Pope Francis says he's still feeling the effects of anesthesia from abdominal surgery two weeks ago and that his breathing isn't good

title: 5 aboard lost Titanic sub could survive for 'hours' after airtank depleted: Doctor
description: Despite their onboard oxygen tank expected to be depleted sometime Thursday morning, the five people aboard the lost Titanic tourist sub could survive for hours.

title: Tropical Storm Bret barrels toward eastern Caribbean at near-hurricane strength
description: A hurricane watch has been issued for St. Lucia as Tropical Storm Bret barrels toward the eastern Caribbean at near-hurricane strength

title: Charges filed year after phony signatures roiled Michigan race for governor
description: Three people have been charged with forgery and other crimes in an investigation of phony petition signatures that spoiled the candidacies of five Republicans who were running for Michigan governor in 2022

title: Weekly US applications for unemployment aid remain relatively elevated
description: The number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits remained elevated last week, a possible sign that the Federal Reserve’s rate hikes are beginning to cool a still-strong labor market

title: Tornado strikes tiny Texas town, killing at least 4, amid cross-country storms
description: There were a total of 11 reported tornadoes across four U.S. states on Wednesday -- Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado and Texas.

title: NTSB holds 2-day hearing on East Palestine toxic train derailment
description: The National Transportation Safety Board will start taking sworn testimony Thursday as part of its probe into the toxic train derailment in East Palestine, Ohio.

title: Cooking gas explosion kills 31 people at a barbecue restaurant in northwestern China
description: Authorities in northwestern China say 31 people have been killed and seven injured in a cooking gas explosion at a barbecue restaurant in the city of Yinchuan

title: WATCH:  Suspected gas leak explosion injures dozens in central Paris
description: Dozens of people were injured after an explosion caused by a suspected gas leak, according to police and firefighters in Paris.

title: Thousands of residents in Oklahoma and Louisiana remain without power after storms
description: Thousands of residents in Oklahoma and Louisiana remain without electricity as work crews continue to repair power lines damaged by weekend storms
